Blackfang: I'm not certain. I'll relay some of my energy to it so it 
won't go definitely offline. The entries I did earlier activated it 
and might drain it faster.

He opens a small hatch on the side of his chest and takes a wire out 
of it. He plugs it in the pod, and feels weaker, but not much.

Blackfang: Just make it quick... If this lasts too long, I'm a dead 
wolf.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "It's iffy, but hopefully he or she will be ok. We are about 20 
minutes out from base now. You'll think the protoform can hold out 
that long?"
